DemoClass.title: DemoClass
DemoClass.description: Represents a single demo class offered by FinanceVerse 3D, including its video content and administrative control.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DemoClass entity.

title.description: The title of the demo class, displayed to users.

description.description: A detailed text description to be displayed under the demo class video.

videoUrl.description: The URL of the demo class video, which can be a YouTube private link or an MP4 file URL.

isActive.description: A flag indicating whether the 'Attend Demo Class' section should be visible and accessible to users. (Managed by admin panel)

lastUpdated.description: The timestamp indicating when the demo class information was last updated.

definition.description: The single document containing the global DemoClass configuration.

params.name: adminUserId
params.description: The unique Firebase Authentication User ID (UID) of the administrator.

firestore.reasoning: Fixed path segments to satisfy DocumentReference requirements (even count).
